reviewContent: Xavier has been great to work with.
While Xavier is rather new, he makes up for it with professionalism and persistence.
Charlie is an excellent pilot and is always very professional.
Charlie always knows exactly whats supposed to happen, his extensive experience makes him reliable.
This guy crashed our drone, and then got upset at us for yelling. Wouldn't recommend him.
Jeb is a menace. He flies like he's in a drone race. While he IS fast, I don't think he's very safe.
Isaac is a little older, but that makes him really patient and he's got alot of experience.
Isaac great. He's took a little longer than other pilots, but he still gets the job done.
